TopicTitle: Indie MEGABOOTH Plays Career Mode on KSP-TV

Articles.Content:
On Tuesday, November 19, 6 PM CST, our pals at Indie MEGABOOTH are stopping by KSP-TV for a special event. They will be live streaming their way through KSP's Career Mode. Indie MEGABOOTH is an organization of indie game devs that come together and showcase the finest, most innovative titles in all of independent gaming at PAX. They've quickly become one of the most popular destinations during PAX and have given games like Stanley Parable, Contrast and my personal favorite, Sportsfriends, a major public platform each year.

You don't want to miss this exciting look at KSP's Career Mode being played LIVE by the Indie MEGABOOTH crew on KSP-TV. Tuesday night at 6PM CST!
